summary: The script orchestrates the training and evaluation of a heteronym classification model for grapheme‑to‑phoneme conversion in text‑to‑speech. It parses a Hydra configuration, initializes the NeMo heteronym classification model, sets up experiment management and logging, configures a PyTorch Lightning trainer with callbacks (including epoch timing), and runs the training and optional evaluation pipelines.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to train and assess a heteronym classification model that improves pronunciation handling of ambiguous words in TTS systems.
